title: HTTPS - Phase I
user_story:
As an API user\
I want to have the option to use an SSL-secured connection\
So I can be sure that all my requests are going through the actual More Cars servers
description:
* every route is accessible via HTTPS, e.g. `https://api.more-cars.net/brands`
* in phase I every route is also still available via HTTP, e.g. `http://api.more-cars.net/brands`
* there are no automatic redirects from one protocol to the other
